code: import React from"react";import{Checkbox}from"semantic-ui-react";import{BASE_URL}from"./ToDo";export default(function(props){var id=props.id,done=props.done,onCheck=props.onCheck;var handleOnDone=function handleOnDone(id,done){var checkDone={done:!done};fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/todo/").concat(id,".json"),{method:"PATCH",body:JSON.stringify(checkDone)}).then(function(){onCheck();});};return React.createElement(Checkbox,{label:"done",toggle:true,style:{margin:"15px"},checked:done,onClick:function onClick(){return handleOnDone(id,done);}});});
